prompt:
Use case: stylized-concept
Asset type: login page background (desktop)
Primary request: a centered 3D stylized popcorn bucket with floating kernels, inspired by the reference image
Scene/background: soft cinematic glow with subtle film reel silhouettes; background gradient 90deg #020024 to rgba(28,14,96,0.926) at 49% to #0b181b
Subject: red-and-white striped popcorn bucket, overflowing popcorn
Style/medium: clean 3D illustration, soft shading, crisp edges
Composition/framing: centered subject, generous negative space around; safe margins for UI overlay
Lighting/mood: warm key light on popcorn; cool ambient background; gentle vignette
Color palette: deep navy/purple with warm buttery highlights
Materials/textures: glossy popcorn bucket, fluffy popcorn texture
Quality: high
Constraints: no text, no logos, no watermarks, no people, no extra props; keep background clean
